trends: There have been 24 other sightings in Flagstaff
There were no other sightings in Flagstaff on or around July 17th 2008
divs: sighting detailsmom,wife and i where siiting on the back deck chatting. the sky was slight haze with an almost full moon behind me. there was less than a hundred stars visable in my line of sight. i noticed a bright star size light moving from my left horizon to directly overhead and then faded at about a 45 degree of my right side line of sight. this all occured in aproxamatley 15 seconds. another similar light came from the same direction and headed behind the front part of the house. not sure of my north\south coordinates in this area. have no idea what it was, never seen anything move across the sky like that. the light was solid white in color with slight orange as it faded away. there was planes flying in the area with very noticeable becons flashing. all three of us witnessed it.
Summary: 2 sightings of Star like light at high rate of speed
